	We are looking for a driven, analytical, and curious Investment Associate to join our growing investment team.
	In this role, you will work closely with partners and portfolio companies, gaining experience across the full venture investment lifecycle - from sourcing and screening deals to conducting deep due diligence, building financial models, and supporting startups post-investment.
	If you&#39;re excited by African tech, comfortable working across multiple sectors, and ready to support high-impact decisions this role is for you.

	Source and evaluate early-stage startups across emerging sectors
	Analyze business models, product-market fit, and founder quality
	Conduct financial analysis and build models to assess funding and exit potential
	Write high-quality investment memos and present findings to the team
	Support due diligence processes: market sizing, customer interviews, competitor benchmarking
	Track market trends and maintain relationships within the startup ecosystem
	Help monitor portfolio company performance and add strategic value

	3 - 5 years of experience in VC, investment banking, consulting, or startups
	Excellent research and analytical skills
	Strong understanding of early-stage startup metrics and cap tables
	Financial modeling proficiency
	Excellent written and verbal communication
	Interest in African markets and startup ecosystems
	Self-motivated with strong attention to detail
	Prior experience creating or reviewing investment memos

	Competitive compensation and performance-based incentives
	Exposure to high-impact early-stage investing across Africa
	Close mentorship from experienced partners and operators
	Ability to shape investment theses and influence fund strategy
	A collaborative and entrepreneurial team culture

Investment Associate Job at Oui Capital




        
    

        
        Oui Capital is a venture capital firm in Nigeria, focused on investing in and supporting innovative startups and entrepreneurs. Our mission is to empower the next generation of African leaders and change-makers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Investment Associate

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Hybrid / Remote)

Role Overview
     

            
    




	We are looking for a driven, analytical, and curious Investment Associate to join our growing investment team.
	In this role, you will work closely with partners and portfolio companies, gaining experience across the full venture investment lifecycle - from sourcing and screening deals to conducting deep due diligence, building financial models, and supporting startups post-investment.
	If you're excited by African tech, comfortable working across multiple sectors, and ready to support high-impact decisions this role is for you.


Key Responsibilities


	Source and evaluate early-stage startups across emerging sectors
	Analyze business models, product-market fit, and founder quality
	Conduct financial analysis and build models to assess funding and exit potential
	Write high-quality investment memos and present findings to the team
	Support due diligence processes: market sizing, customer interviews, competitor benchmarking
	Track market trends and maintain relationships within the startup ecosystem
	Help monitor portfolio company performance and add strategic value


What we're looking for


	3 - 5 years of experience in VC, investment banking, consulting, or startups
	Excellent research and analytical skills
	Strong understanding of early-stage startup metrics and cap tables
	Financial modeling proficiency
	Excellent written and verbal communication
	Interest in African markets and startup ecosystems
	Self-motivated with strong attention to detail
	Prior experience creating or reviewing investment memos


What We Offer


	Competitive compensation and performance-based incentives
	Exposure to high-impact early-stage investing across Africa
	Close mentorship from experienced partners and operators
	Ability to shape investment theses and influence fund strategy
	A collaborative and entrepreneurial team culture


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: recruit@ouicapital.vc using "Investment Associate Application-[Your Full Name]" as the subject of the email.
